execution_quality: Well-executed implementation with proper file creation and modifications across the codebase. Agent recovered from errors during implementation and verified work with test execution before committing.
work_category: Feature implementation for UI theme system with multiple configuration options (light/dark/system mode and color scheme selection). Required coordinating new component creation, state management, settings integration, and type definitions.
summary: Agent successfully implemented a complete theme support system matching user requirements for light/dark/system modes with color scheme customization. The work was largely autonomous with good error recovery, though minor scope misalignment may exist around exact color scheme options offered. The immediate commit request suggests user approval of the implementation.
follow_up_pattern: User requested commit directly after completion, suggesting they reviewed and approved the work. The immediate commit request indicates satisfaction or readiness to move forward rather than requesting changes.
